Articles.Content:
I remember a challenge before the forums went down that was a kethane only challenge (you had to get all fuel from kethane), and I'm wondering if anyone has some sort of backup or remembers the rules?

Thanks in advance.
It was you had a limited amount of SRBs and no liquid fuel, and you had to use the Kethane detectors to find kethane and use that as liquid fuel.

It was you had a limited amount of SRBs and no liquid fuel, and you had to use the Kethane detectors to find kethane and use that as liquid fuel.

All of my kethane pockets on kerbin are really far away from KSC. I may have to bend the rules then.
